The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/home/adrianesqueiros/sinapsis/starwars-.serviceRawFile:
service: starwars-marketplace-api

plugins:  
  - serverless-offline

provider:
  name: aws
  region: us-east-1
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  stage: dev
  memorySize: 128
  logRetentionInDays: 1
  timeout: 15
  environment:
    DYNAMODB_TABLE: StarWarsMarketplace
    HISTORY_TABLE: StarWarsMarketplaceHistory
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: "Allow"
          Action:
            - "dynamodb:PutItem"
            - "dynamodb:GetItem"
            - "dynamodb:Scan"
            - "dynamodb:Query"   
          Resource: 
            - "arn:aws:dynamodb:${opt:region, self:provider.region}:*:table/StarWarsMarketplace"
            - "arn:aws:dynamodb:${opt:region, self:provider.region}:*:table/StarWarsMarketplaceHistory"

functions:
  main:
    handler: dist/src/main.handler
    events:
      - http:
          method: any
          path: /{any+}


package:
  individually: true
  exclude:
    - node_modules/aws-sdk/**
    - node_modules/.bin/**
    - node_modules/**/*.md
    - node_modules/**/*.test.js
    - node_modules/**/*.debug.js
    - node_modules/**/*.spec.js
    - node_modules/**/*.ts
    - node_modules/**/*.tsbuildinfo
    - node_modules/**/test/**
    - node_modules/**/spec/**
    - node_modules/**/docs/**
    - node_modules/**/coverage/**
    - node_modules/**/.cache/**
    - node_modules/**/.eslintrc.js
    - node_modules/**/.prettierrc
    - node_modules/**/tsconfig.json
    - node_modules/**/tsconfig.build.json
    - node_modules/**/jestconfig.json

resources:
  Resources:
    StarWarsMarketplaceTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.DYNAMODB_TABLE}
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: cacheKey
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: cacheKey
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST # Escala automticamente con el uso
    StarWarsMarketplaceHistoryTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: StarWarsMarketplaceHistory
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: timestamp
            AttributeType: N
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: timestamp
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
